patterns: Hi
Hey
How are you
Is anyone there?
Hello
Good day
responses: Hey :-)
Hello, thanks for visiting
Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: Bye
See you later
Goodbye
responses: See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.

patterns: Thanks
Thank you
That's helpful
Thank's a lot!
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
